"<br>About Team Orders<br>":
"A Team Order is an order that you can complete to earn Team Points.

In addition to Team Points, you will also earn EXP."

"The available Team Orders will change every week.

Any Team Orders that you have accepted can be progressed and handed in at any time. You do not have to complete them before the available orders change."

"Team Orders can be taken from the Team Counter attendant, Farma.

Co-operate with your teammates to complete Team Orders and help to improve your Team."
